original_text: Then Nebuzaradan, the captain of the guard, carried into exile to Babylon the rest of the people who were left in the city, those who had deserted to him, and the people who remained.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단이 성중에 남아 있는 백성과 자기에게 항복한 자와 그 외의 남은 백성을 잡아 바벨론으로 옮겼으며

sentences.original_text: Then Nebuzaradan, the captain of the guard,
the rest of the people who were left in the city,
those who had deserted to him,
